3: City 075, Core Area of the underground cavern.
The holo-map in front clearly shows red dots moving around the city. Based on their distance, it is obvious that they are closing in.
Should we annihilate our uninvited guests?
That won't be necessary.
Miss Luna, it is the Gray Ravens with their human commandant.
I know.
Are you not going to take action?
If they've found this place, that means...
Luna stops mid-sentence, then smiles silently.
Where is Lamia?
She's not on a mission. She must be slacking on the job.
Oh really.
Since our guests have arrived at the door, there is no reason not to entertain them.
Roland.
...'Welcome' our guests.
Roger.
Sister.
Yes?
Take Huaxu out of here.
Understood.
Alpha and Roland proceed in opposite directions. Luna looks at the holo-map and extends her hand out at the approaching red dots.
Maybe you will understand once you remember.
...How despicable and selfish humans truly are.
Lucia...
